title: Especialista Em Tesouraria
description:
A inovação e o pioneirismo sempre fizeram parte da nossa história, que começou em 1980. Temos o DNA de varejo, já que nascemos da Pernambucanas – marca centenária que sempre contou com os serviços financeiros para apoiar as famílias brasileiras de maneira fácil e democrática. Ao longo dos anos, as soluções evoluíram e se diversificaram, permitindo à Pefisa se consolidar no mercado financeiro.

Somos responsáveis pelo desenvolvimento e gestão de produtos como cartões, empréstimo pessoal, seguros e a conta digital, com diferenciais como simplicidade, praticidade e sem burocracia. Prezamos por bons relacionamentos, pelo atendimento próximo e por jogar junto.

Com mais de 5 milhões de clientes ativos e grande relevância na área do varejo, disponibilizamos um amplo portfólio de serviços para pessoas físicas e jurídicas, além de um Banking as a Service (BaaS) para marcas de diversos segmentos. Com isso, adotamos iniciativas inovadoras para clientes e parceiros.

Na Pefisa tudo é simples. Tudo é rápido. Te ajudamos com o que você precisa para realizar seus sonhos ou alavancar seu negócio. E você escolhe como quer conversar, pois nós somos Fígital. Atuamos com a melhor experiência entre o físico e o digital, com nossas plataformas digitais ou através de nossas lojas físicas. Somos a fintech pra gente como a gente.



Cargo:
Especialista de Tesouraria


Gestão Financeira


  • Gestão do fluxo de caixa de curto, médio e longo prazo. Sendo o principal responsável por gerir a liquidez da instituição financeira
  • Lidar com relacionamentos bancários e parceiros de negócio (adquirentes, administradora e gestora do FIDC)
  • Análise de estruturas de dívida, garantir a previsão de liquidez de curto, médio e longo prazo, manutenção das linhas de crédito tomadas com bancos e monitorar o mercado afim de propor as melhores opções financeiras.
  • Negociação com bancos, negociação contratual, modelagem de dívidas - reduzir riscos financeiros e otimizar a lucratividade.
  • Gestão do portfólio (agenda) de recebíveis, realizando as conciliações, fluxo de recebíveis garantindo que os valores de repasses estão corretos junto a bandeira do cartão
  • Atuar em parceria com áreas correlatas como FP&A e Controladoria, provendo dados e indicadores que suportem as demandas do negócio
  • Captação de recursos, seja via projetos ou linhas de credito com bancos.


Automação e Análise de Dados

  • Criar dashboards e realizar sua manutenção para uma Tesouraria Estratégica.
  • Construir relatórios automatizados no Excel através de VBA e fomentar no time esse desempenho.
  • Auxiliar no design de sistemas e processos automatizados para aprimorar nossos processos internos.
  • Buscar automação dos processos, utilizando habilidades com SQL, Power BI, programação e automações.


Relatórios e Controles

  • Preparar relatórios financeiros detalhados para gestão e colaborar com auditorias internas e externas, implementando controles internos eficazes para prevenir fraudes e garantir a integridade financeira.
  • Gerenciamento diário de caixa e reconciliação entre extratos bancários e transações.
  • Gerenciar operações e controles de tesouraria.
  • Gerenciar da operação de antecipação de recebíveis com bancos ou FIDC.
  • Desenvolver relatórios de fechamento contábil mensal com os números da área.
  • Desenvolver apresentações em powerpoint de alto nível e apresentar os resultados para a gestão executiva da instituição financeira.


Qualificações:


  • Educação:
    Superior completo em Estatística, Matemática, Economia, Engenharia ou área relacionada.
  • Experiência comprovada em gestão de tesouraria, preferencialmente na indústria de cartões de crédito e/ou meios de pagamento
  • Experiência no mercado financeiro (bancos ou meios de pagamento).
  • Experiência prévia com negociação de contratos para Captação de Recursos.
  • Experiência prévia com modelagem de instrumentos financeiros.
  • Conhecimento prévio de Tesouraria Estratégica (Gestão de Fluxo de Caixa, Precificação, Investimentos, FIDC) de pelo menos 2 anos.


Habilidades Técnicas:


  • Domínio de Power BI, VBA.
  • Noções de SQL e Python seriam um diferencial.
  • Experiência com plataformas de visualização de dados, como Tableau, Power BI ou equivalentes.
  • Habilidades Analíticas:
  • Alta capacidade analítica, atenção a detalhes e comprovadas habilidades em modelagem financeira.
  • Forte capacidade de analisar dados financeiros e preparar relatórios financeiros.
  • Habilidades de Comunicação:
  • Excelente compreensão dos mercados financeiros e instrumentos.
  • Conhecimento em Conformidade:
    Familiaridade com os requisitos regulatórios relacionados às operações de tesouraria em instituição regulamentada pelo BACEN



Nossos benefícios:

Assistência Médica Mediservice (cooparticipação);

Assistência Odontológica Odontoseg (por adesão);

Vale-Alimentação;

Vale-Refeição no período de férias;

Vale Cultura (poradesão);

Seguro de Vida (por adesão);

PPR;

Bicicletário;

Desconto nos produtos Pernambucanas;

Auxilio Creche;

Plano de Carreira;

Parceria com instituições de Ensino para cursos de graduação, pós graduação e descontos em curso de idiomas.

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
Job Description
About You
You are someone who wants to influence your own development. You’re looking for a company where you have the opportunity to pursue your interests and be able to grow professionally.
You bring to Applaudo the following competencies:

  • Desirable Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Computer Science or Computer Engineering or a related field.
  • 3+ years experience in React, Proficiency in hooks, context API, and component lifecycle.
  • Experience implementing responsive UI components using React, TypeScript, and state management libraries (Redux, React Query)
  • Experience in unit and integration testing with Jest, React Testing Library, xUnit, or NUnit.
  • Experience with front-end state management using Redux and React Query.
  • Hands of experience in C#/.NET Core development skills, including ASP.NET Web API and MVC.
  • Desirable experience with Docker and Kubernetes for containerized deployments.
  • Desirable experience with Azure, AWS, or Google Cloud for cloud-based applications.
  • Proficiency in version control systems (Git, GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket).

You will be accountable for the following responsibilities:

title: Gerente De Marketing
description:
Resumo da Posição


O Gerente de Marketing será responsável pelo desenvolvimento e implementação de estratégias de marketing, fortalecimento da marca no setor e suporte às vendas, garantindo a competitividade da empresa no mercado ferroviário.


Principais Responsabilidades


1- Desenvolvimento de Estratégia


  • Criar e executar o plano de marketing alinhado às estratégias comerciais da empresa no setor ferroviário.
  • Analisar tendências do mercado ferroviário, concorrência e novas oportunidades de negócios.
  • Desenvolver posicionamento e diferenciação da marca no setor.


2- Gestão de Marca e Comunicação


  • Garantir uma comunicação eficaz da marca para clientes, parceiros e stakeholders do setor ferroviário.
  • Desenvolver campanhas publicitárias, materiais de marketing e conteúdos técnicos para promover produtos e serviços.
  • Gerenciar a presença digital da empresa (website, redes sociais, newsletters).


3- Geração de Demanda e Suporte Comercial


  • Implementar estratégias para geração de leads e suporte ao time de vendas.
  • Organizar e participar de feiras, eventos e conferências do setor ferroviário.
  • Criar apresentações e materiais de apoio para a equipe comercial.


4- Relacionamento com Stakeholders


  • Manter relacionamento com associações, órgãos reguladores e influenciadores do setor ferroviário.
  • Estabelecer parcerias estratégicas para ampliar a presença da empresa no mercado.


5- Gestão de Performance


  • Definir e acompanhar KPIs de marketing, analisando métricas de campanhas e ajustando estratégias conforme necessário.
  • Controlar o orçamento de marketing e otimizar os investimentos para melhor ROI.


Requisitos


1- Formação:
 Superior em Marketing, Administração, Engenharia ou áreas correlatas. Pós-graduação/MBA será um diferencial.


2- Experiência:

  • Experiência em marketing no setor ferroviário
  • Conhecimento de regulamentações e tendências do setor ferroviário.
  • Experiência com licitações e contratos públicos na área de transporte e infraestrutura.


3- Conhecimentos Técnicos:

  • Estratégias de marketing B2B.
  • Ferramentas de marketing digital, CRM e automação de marketing.
  • Eventos e feiras do setor ferroviário.


4- Habilidades:

  • Pensamento estratégico e analítico.
  • Comunicação clara e persuasiva.
  • Capacidade de liderança e gestão de equipe.
  • Habilidade para negociação e networking.


5- Idiomas:
 Inglês avançado é fundamental, devido ao contato constante com o time internacional, bem como fornecedores e clientes internacionais.

title: Fp&A Manager – Revenue & Customer Profitability
description:
Job title:
FP&A Manager – Revenue & Customer Profitability

Reporting directly to the Finance Director of the Cone Sul Platform, this role will have a strong focus on Revenue & Customer Profitability , overseeing financial planning, data accuracy, and profitability analysis to support strategic decision-making.


Location:
 Vila Olímpia, São Paulo – On-site


About Emergent Cold Latam

Emergent Cold Latam is one of the leading temperature-controlled storage companies in Latin America, providing essential logistics solutions for the food supply chain. With operations in multiple countries across the region, the company is continuously growing, investing in technology, innovation, and the professional development of its employees to ensure efficiency, safety, and excellence in customer service.


Main responsibilities:

  • Ensure data quality assurance and governance by verifying data integrity, consistency, and accuracy across company systems.
  • Ensure billing accuracy through verification between Korber and SAP systems.
  • Analyze financial data from FP&A reports for customer P&L review.
  • Validate new financial reports, ensuring accuracy and consistency of information.
  • Perform detailed verification of customer accruals.
  • Collect and validate data, ensuring integrity and consistency across company systems.
  • Collaborate with Commercial, Billing, FP&A, Operations, and other teams to enhance financial processes and profitability analysis.
  • Lead the end-to-end generation and analysis of customer profitability reports, from data input to management presentations.
  • Monitor and track key performance indicators (KPIs), providing insights into financial metrics.
  • Develop and enhance data visualization using Power BI, Excel, and SAP Analytics.
  • Identify opportunities for customer profitability improvement and ensure action plans are implemented.
  • Conduct contract benchmarking, revenue-to-cash analysis, pricing model evaluations, and other profitability initiatives.
  • Act as a financial business partner, supporting local commercial teams with strategic insights.
  • Lead system improvements and implementations, including SAP S/4HANA, WMS Korber, Nsight, Power BI, and data governance projects, ensuring effective project management.

Requirements:

  • Degree in Business, Economics, Engineering, Accounting, or related fields.
  • Financial Controlling & Profitability Analysis
  • End-to-end execution of financial/business analysis reports
  • Data Analysis & Pattern Recognition
  • Pricing Analysis (Highly Desirable)
  • Advanced Microsoft Excel skills
  • Experience with Power BI, MS Access, or similar tools (Desirable)
  • Experience with SAP (CO/Costing Module) or other Global ERPs (Desirable)
  • Experience with Warehouse or Transportation Management Systems (WMS/TMS) (Desirable)


Languages Required:

  • English:
     Advanced
  • Spanish:
     Intermediate


Availability for travel:
30% of the time.

title: Finance Manager
description:
Role - Finance Manager (Sao Paulo - Brazil)


Who we are

House of Shipping provides business consultancy and advisory services for Shipping & Logistics companies. House of Shipping's commitment to their customers begins with developing an understanding of their business fundamentals.


Currently House of Shipping is recruiting for a Finance Manager on Behalf of its client in Sao Paulo - Brazil.


Job purpose

The Manager – Finance is responsible for overseeing financial operations, ensuring accurate accounting records, managing reconciliations, forecasting cash flow, handling audits, and implementing financial process improvements. The role ensures financial compliance, efficient cash management, and timely reporting while supporting business functions with financial insights.


Main tasks and responsibilities

Financial Transactions & Accounting Operations

  • Record daily accounting transactions in the accounting system, ensuring financial accuracy and compliance.
  • Manage DO counter operations and oversee daily cash and cheque handling.
  • Post cash and bank transactions daily and perform bank reconciliations.
  • Reconcile vessel and voyage accounts to ensure accuracy in financial reporting.
  • Maintain up-to-date intercompany reconciliations, resolving discrepancies in a timely manner.
  • Ensure all financial vouchers are filed daily for audit and compliance purposes.
  • Implement financial controls and policies to ensure adherence to accounting standards and regulatory requirements.

Financial Reporting & Compliance

  • Oversee month-end book closure, ensuring accurate financial statement preparation and timely reporting.
  • Prepare and finalize DA (Document Against Acceptance) documents and coordinate timely fund remittance.
  • Monitor and submit weekly cash flow reports to maintain financial stability.
  • Support external and internal audits by preparing documentation and ensuring compliance with financial policies.
  • Ensure full compliance with financial regulations, including tax laws and statutory reporting.

Cash Flow & Expense Management

  • Prepare and analyze cash flow forecasts to maintain financial liquidity and operational efficiency.
  • Oversee payment processes and expense tracking to control costs and maintain financial discipline.
  • Monitor collections and receivables to ensure timely payments from customers.
  • Maintain a structured approach to expense approvals and payment authorization to ensure compliance.

Process Improvement & Risk Management

  • Identify opportunities for financial process optimization to enhance efficiency.
  • Develop internal controls to minimize financial risks and discrepancies.
  • Drive automation initiatives in financial reporting and reconciliation to improve accuracy.
  • Ensure business risk assessment and mitigation plans are in place for financial functions.


Work Experience

  • Shipping, Logistics, or Maritime Industry.
  • Finance Manager or similar financial leadership role.
  • Minimum 5 years of experience in financial management.
  • Strong understanding of Brazil tax laws, statutory reporting requirements, and financial compliance regulations.
  • Office-based role with occasional external meetings.
  • Travel:
    Minimal travel required for regulatory or audit meetings.

    • Education requirements

    • Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
    • Proficiency in financial management software such as EBMS, Tally, and MS Excel.

title: Content Operations Coordinator
description:
Content Operations Coordinator


Job Description:
Summary:

The main function of a Content Operations Coordinator is to aid in the management of content on a platform. The Content Operations Coordinator will work with product and partnerships teams to create and review targeted materials and reports to drive traffic to content. The typical Content Operations Coordinator will have strong editorial judgment, ability to drive processes and organize execution across a variety of projects and products, and have a basic understanding of data analysis. They will also help guide the success of the team through coaching, collaboration, and building relationships.



Job Responsibilities:

Create and coordinate all website requests in conjunction with the marketing team

Manage day-to-day facilitation of project execution at the workstream level -Develop lightweight, repeatable processes, workflows and content templates that keep the team nimble and successful in a culture that values moving fast and iterating quickly

Identify cultural trends across a diverse spectrum of topics

Create and edit monthly digital marketing content calendar

Develop strategy and create plans for events and cultural moments

Collaborate with our product teams to improve user experience

Perform analysis and produce reports with compelling, actionable insights for our partners



Skills:

Ability to work independently

Knowledge of project management and leading a team through the cycle of the creative process -A proven track record of managing complex workflows w/ operational expertise

Creative self-starter with a strong work ethic and ability to work independently

Ability to interpret, analyze and evaluate given information relative to content techniques

Self motivated with persuasive, enthusiastic and customer service oriented personality

Excellent communication skills, verbal and written -Proficient in English


Must have skills:

Must be fluent in Portuguese and English ability.

Detailed oriented

title: Sales Executive
description:
Company Description

Tuna was founded in 2020 by our CEO, Alexander Tabor, and our CTO, Paul Ascher, after building the orchestration product for their own use, while co-founding Peixe Urbano.


We were born as a software company with a large retailer as our first client and we have made the product even more robust.


Some of ours current business cases:
Ri Happy, ClickBus, Fast Shop, Kipling, Coach, Jansport, Diesel, Grazziotin, Webcontinental, Zé Delivery, Anota Aí and several other segments.


About the Orchestrator

Our proposal is to expand the client's checkout and allow them (B2C/B2B) to configure more than one payment provider at the same time, configure re-attempts for approvals, conduct AB tests without coding, and determine the most effective combination for your business.

We have been optimizing results and helping our clients to increase approval rates and reduce fraud costs.


Role Description

This is a hibrid and full-time role.

Sales Executive will be responsible for new logos, since reach out to potential clients, present our solutions until the begginig of the Onboarding Process - it involves maintain client relationships and meeting sales targets.

Report:
Sales Team Leader


Qualifications

  • Strong sales and negotiation skills
  • Knowledge of online payment systems and fraud prevention
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
  • Ability to work independently
  • Experience in B2B sales is a plus
  • Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field

title: Logistics Supervisor
description:
Logistics Supervisor


The Logistics Operations Supervisor in Brazil will oversee all inventory management and logistics operations, ensuring efficient and cost-effective processes. This role includes managing the logistics team, optimizing inventory control, coordinating shipments, and ensuring compliance with local regulations. The supervisor will focus on maintaining seamless supply chain operations to meet customer demands and support business objectives.


Requirements


Bachelor’s degree in Logistics, Administration, Engineering or Supply Chain Management or related .

5 years of experience as a Logistics Supervisor/Coordinator is required.

Post degree or MBA in Supply Chain or Logístics or related is desirable.

Advanced English is mandatory (an interview will be conducted).

Spanish Advanced is desirable.


Responsabilities:


  • Team Supervision:
    Oversee a team of logistics ensuring that daily tasks are completed efficiently and accurately.
  • Performance Management:
    Conduct regular performance evaluations, provide feedback, and set development goals for team members to improve their skills and performance.
  • Training and Development:
    Identify training needs and organize training sessions to enhance the team’s knowledge of logistics processes, safety protocols, and use of logistics software.
  • Scheduling and Resource Allocation:
    Create work schedules, assign tasks, and manage resources to ensure smooth operation of logistics activities and timely completion of objectives.
  • Conflict Resolution:
    Address and resolve conflicts within the team, promoting a positive and collaborative work environment.
  • Compliance and Safety Oversight:
    Ensure that all team members follow company policies, safety guidelines, and regulatory requirements, taking corrective action when necessary.
  • Process Improvement:
    Lead initiatives to identify inefficiencies and implement improvements in logistics processes, engaging the team in continuous improvement efforts.
  • Budget Management:
    Monitor and control the department’s budget, ensuring that resources are used effectively, and cost savings are achieved where possible.

title: Project Manager
description:
As THE leader in transit technology, Clever Devices' vision is to make meaningful contributions to worldwide mobility. Our goal is to be the leading provider of exciting technology that improves the quality of mobility in communities around the world. We are continuing to grow, and are looking for a Project Manager to join our team.

The Project Manager is responsible for the financial, applicable technology and schedule performance of assigned projects within cost limitations and established standards. The Project Manager leads the project team for technical review of system design necessary to execute the assigned projects.

Primary Responsibilities:

  • Manage all aspects of a project, including planning, organization, and implementation of project activities
  • Provide overall project communication to stakeholders and meet project requirements and stakeholder expectations
  • Serves as primary point of contact with the customer of the project and keeps customer appraised of project progress
  • Manage project activities, such as issue tracking and risk mitigation, facilitating project team meetings and preparing/delivering status reports
  • Work closely with cross functional departments (Deployment, Engineering Design, Installation, Production and Field Service) to ensure successful execution of projects
  • Established a working relationship with the customer’s stakeholders and maintains good communication correspondence with customer.
  • Assembles appropriate team to meet and exceed project expectations
  • Provide direction and control of work performed in the framework of project, including monitoring the critical path and implementation of appropriate corrective actions
  • Coordinate and perform review of the project deliverables, software and hardware, and report on project performance
  • Manage and plan with the Systems Engineering and Product/Engineering team leads for technical review of system design and documentation with the customer
  • Able to perform basic hardware and software hands-on work.
  • Manages applicable technology and quality assurance of assigned projects
  • Establishes a project plan and schedules.
  • Establishes milestones and monitors adherence to program master plans
  • Manages financial schedule performance of assigned projects
  • Maintains and keeps scheduling of assigned projects and communicates schedule changes as necessary
  • Manages full lifecycle of project and ensures each aspect of the project is completed
  • Manages procurement of equipment and materials necessary to execute on projects
  • Coordinates with Sales and Account Managers to further sales opportunities
  • May coordinate proposal preparation, including standards of work and specifications, estimation of product and service costs.
  • May participate in negotiation and administration of contracts
  • Travel required for onsite at customers facility 30-40% of the time including travel abroad.
  • Adheres to company processes and policies.

Skills Required:

  • 10+ years’ experience as a Project Manager in a technical or engineering environment
  • PMP certification
  • Strong computer skills, including MS Office Suite, Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Outlook as well as ability to learn new software programs such as Microsoft Dynamics D365 and Power BI
  • Strong team building and leadership skills. Ability to lead the team.
  • Strong organizational skills
  • Strong problem-solving skills
  • Strong analytical skills
  • Strong time management skills and ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously
  • Strong verbal and written communications, presentation, and persuasive skills
  • Strong interpersonal skills
  • Strong negotiation and influence skills
  • B.S. Degree and or 5+ Years as a Project Manager in and ITS environment



Clever Devices is an Affirmative Action/Equal Opportunity Employer

title: Analista De Empréstimo
description:
As principais responsabilidades da vaga são:

  1. Concessão de Empréstimos/Financiamentos - Analisar e conceder empréstimos, através das normas e procedimentos definidos pela Instituição, visando a satisfação do cliente;

4. Cálculo da Rentabilidade- Demonstrar o retorno proporcionado no segmento de operações com os participantes.

  1. Seguro Prestamista da Carteira de Empréstimos - Acompanhar a sinistralidade da carteira, providenciar a habilitação dos sinistros e efetuar o pagamento mensal da fatura.



Requisitos técnicos necessários:

  • Superior Completo em Administração, Economia ou áreas correlatas
  • CPA-20 emitida
  • com Pacote Office – Excel Avançado

 (Segunda a sexta das 09h00 às 18h00)
